title: Still Looking for Raw T206 Commons
author: Bocabirdman

posts.post_title: Still Looking for Raw T206 Commons
posts.post_content: My previous post looking for Raw T206 Commons generated 6 successful transactions with board members for a total of 26 cards. Thanks to all. Anyone else have any middle-ish grade commons they'd like to get rid of? PM me or post here and I AM SURE we can get something done:).....Thanks Mike
One Tropical Storm Isaac bump. Thankfully. the storm jogged west and then jogged west again. We have wound up with an ugly Sunday here in Boca but nothing crazy...:)

What the heck....another bump cannot hurt.........Still looking for Raw Commons with common backs in decent shape. minimal creasing. No P/L on fronts...A little bit on the back is OK. Scrapbook residue might be OK. No trimmed or bullet (staple) holes please. PM me or leave a post here. I would much rather deal with a board member here and avoid the feeBay nonsense. I am addicted to these sill T206s. Help a junkie out?:D

Greeting Mike,

I have the following T206 for sale (or possibly trade) if you are interested:

Congalton, Piedmont 350 back, Condition is Fair:  $22 shipped
Covaleski, Piedmont 150 back, Condition is Good:  $25 shipped
Gandil with faint wet sheet transfer on front!, Sweet Cap 350-460 Fact 42 back, Condition is Very Good:  $105 shipped.

Scans are below.

Feel free to contact me by email [url]craig_w67217@yahoo.com[/url] or PM, if any interest you.

Best Regards and Happy Collecting :)

posts.post_title: Just a bump for a bump's sake
posts.post_content:
Just wanted to bump this thread as I am still looking for decent T206 commons. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks to all the folks who have helped me so far and thanks in advance to anyone who might yet respond..:)
Please PM me or respond here if you want to work out a deal....
Hope you got your cards today! If not, then tomorrow for sure! Thank you.
Hi Mike , I have T206 card's of Burch batting and Fiene throwing, cards are both in VG with no crease's and clean back's. Price for both cards is 70.00 shipped.Email for scans, Sylvain
